name: FirstTry (Demo)
description:
In this short 20 minute demo you will have to test your skills at not just timing but also how well you can keep your cool. Will your keyboard survive?... only one way to find out.

Controls: -- Movement Left (A Key, Left arrow Key) -- Movement Right (D Key, Right arrow key) -- Jumping (W Key, Up arrow key, Spacebar) -- Pause Menu (Escape key)


--NOTE: THERE IS NO GAME CHECKPOINTS OR SAVES!--
